shape_tria3.c

00006 *******************************************************************************
00007 * DESCRIPTION                                                                 *
00008 * Returns a vector N with the shape functions     2                           *
00009 * for linear interpolation in a isoparametric     |\                          *
00010 * triangular element (3-noded triangle).          |_\                         *
00011 * Node order as in figure.                       3   1                        *
00012 ******************************************************************************/

00037 #include <stdio.h>
00038 #include <stdlib.h>
00039 #include <math.h>
00040 
00041 int shape_tria3(double *L, double *N)
00042 {
00043     /* Shape function definition for node order 1-2-3 */
00044     N[0] = L[0];
00045     N[1] = L[1];
00046     N[2] = 1.0-L[0]-L[1];
00047 
00048     return 0;
00049 }
